content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (15.5, 70.5)
- **Electric mining drill** at (15.5, 70.5) extracting iron ore (output blocked at belt 15.5,72.5)
- **Burner inserter** at (17.5, 72.5) moving ore (output blocked)
- **Transport belt network** connecting drill to furnace (blocked at 15.5,72.5)
- **Stone furnace** at (16.0, 74.0) for smelting (out of fuel)
- **Wooden chest** at (-47.5, 74.5) for storage

#### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-46.5, 70.5)
- **Electric mining drill** at (-46.5, 70.5) extracting copper ore (working)
- **Burner inserter** at (-48.5, 72.5) waiting for source items
- **Transport belt network** connecting drill to furnace
- **Stone furnace** at (-46.0, 74.0) for smelting (out of fuel)
- **Wooden chest** at (-46.5, 74.5) for storage

#### Power Generation Setup at (-21.5, 70.5)
- **Offshore pump** at (-21.5, 70.5) supplying water (working)
- **Boiler** at (-25.0, 80.5) converting water to steam (fueled)
- **Steam engine** at (-25.5, 89.5) generating power (working)
- **Pipe network** connecting components (fluid system 606 for water, 609 for steam)

#### New Power Generation Setup at (-9.5, -0.5)
- **Offshore pump** at (-9.5, -0.5) supplying water (working)
- **Boiler** at (-6.0, 1.5) (not connected)
- **Steam engine** at (-4.5, 6.5) (not connected)
- **Attempted pipe connections** between components (failed)

#### Coal Mining Setup at (16.0, 0.0)
- **Burner mining drill** at (16.0, 0.0) extracting coal (fueled)
- **Temporary burner inserter** at (-44.5, 70.5) for powering copper drill

#### Storage Areas
- **Wooden chest** at (28.5, 74.5)
- **Burner inserter** at (27.5, 74.5) waiting for source items
- **Wooden chest** at (-48.5, 75.5)
- **Wooden chest** at (-46.5, 74.5)
- **Wooden chest** at (-47.5, 74.5)

### ERROR TIPS

#### Placement Distance Issues (3 new instances)
- Move within 10 tiles of target position before placing entities (failed at 15.5,-0.5)
- Verify distance to target before placement attempts
- Implement movement checks before building operations

#### Fuel Management Issues (5 new instances)
- Maintain coal supply for burner inserters (multiple instances out of fuel)
- Verify fuel availability before insertion attempts
- Prioritize fuel distribution to critical systems first

#### Existing Issues (from previous report)
- Clear backed-up transport belts (iron belt at 15.5,72.5)
- Fuel all furnaces and inserters (multiple entities out of fuel)
- Verify inserter pickup/drop positions (multiple instances waiting for source items)
- Maintain proper spacing when placing near existing entities
- Clear existing entities before placement attempts
- Verify power pole placement covers all electrical entities
- Check power network connectivity after placement

#### New Recommendations
- Establish dedicated coal mining operation before expanding
- Implement fuel distribution system for burner entities
- Create distance verification checks before placement attempts
- Develop standardized power plant blueprint with verified connections
- Establish monitoring system for power network coverage
